title: Motor Vehicles Act
summary: When buying a car, make sure it's registered and has a valid driving license. Check that the vehicle meets safety and emission standards. Follow traffic rules and drive safely to avoid fines.

law.article_title: Duty to produce license and certificate of registration

title: Rent Control Act
summary: If you're renting a place, ensure your rent agreement is fair. Landlords cannot increase rent or evict you without a valid reason. If issues arise, you have legal rights to protect yourself.

title: Hindu Marriage Act
summary: For a legal Hindu marriage, you need to meet age requirements and give consent. This act also covers how to handle divorce and alimony if the marriage ends, ensuring fair treatment.

title: Goods and Services Tax (GST) Act
summary: GST combines several taxes into one. When buying goods or services, the tax is included in the price. Businesses need to follow GST rules to ensure proper tax collection and payment.

title: Indian Passport Act
summary: To get or renew an Indian passport, provide necessary documents and pass identity checks. Avoid any fake information or misuse to prevent legal issues.

title: The Employment Exchange Act
summary: Register with government job centers if you're looking for work. Employers will list job openings there, helping you find suitable employment.

title: Consumer Protection Act
summary: If you have issues with products or services, this act helps you file complaints and seek compensation. Businesses must follow fair practices and address customer grievances.

law.article_title: Manner in which complaint shall be made

title: Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) Act
summary: Protect your creative work like inventions, writings, and designs. Ensure no one uses your intellectual property without permission to prevent misuse and loss.

law.article_title: Rights and responsibilities of intellectual property owners

title: Companies Act
summary: When starting a company, follow the registration process and comply with legal requirements. This includes transparent operations and proper financial reporting.

title: Right of Children to Free and Compulsory Education Act
summary: Children aged 6 to 14 must receive free education. Schools and the government must ensure that all children have access to quality education.

law.article_title: Right of child to free and compulsory education

title: The Epidemic Diseases Act
summary: In case of an epidemic, follow government guidelines for quarantine and public health measures to prevent the spread of disease.

law.article_title: Power to take special measures and prescribe regulations as to dangerous epidemic disease

title: Information Technology (Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures and Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules
summary: If you handle personal data, ensure you use secure practices to protect it from unauthorized access. Follow rules to keep data safe and private.

title: Transfer of Property Act
summary: When buying or selling property, ensure the transfer is legally documented and fair. Follow procedures for registration and ensure all rights and responsibilities are clear.

title: Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code
summary: If facing financial difficulties, this code helps you through debt recovery or liquidation processes. It provides a structured way to resolve insolvency issues.

law.article_title: Persons who may initiate corporate insolvency resolution process
Initiation of corporate insolvency resolution process by financial creditor

title: Indian Penal Code
summary: This code outlines what constitutes a crime and the punishments for various offenses. Understand the laws to avoid legal trouble and ensure justice.

title: Indian Contract Act
summary: When entering into agreements, make sure they are valid and fair. The act provides guidelines on forming and enforcing contracts to protect both parties involved.

law.article_title: What considerations and objects are lawful, and what not

title: Environment Protection Act
summary: Follow rules to protect the environment. This includes proper waste disposal and pollution control to ensure a clean and safe environment for everyone.

law.article_title: Power of Central Government to take measures to protect and improve environment
Persons carrying on industry operation not to allow emission or discharge of environmental pollutants in excess of the standards

title: Factories Act
summary: In workplaces, ensure safety standards and health regulations are met. The act provides guidelines to protect workers' rights and ensure safe working conditions.

law.article_title: Approval, licensing and registration of factories
